channel.title: The mass deletion? and to stop spam all my other questions
channel.description: when this happens will every1's posts go down to zero? so say you had 2000post will that go down to 0 post and everyone will be cba to post? again exsept cm's and stuff?[br][size=1]Posted on: December 30, 2006, 02:51:20 PM[/size][hr]how come no one is being rep++ i aint seen any1 plus 3 and i only seen 1 person with and rep

item.title: The mass deletion? and to stop spam all my other questions
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Not everybodies post will go down to zero. Good posts will be saved.

You need a karmic achievement level of 15 to raise somebody elses karma.

You are not allowed to talk about rep on these boards.

Read full topic
item.source: The mass deletion? and to stop spam all my other questions
